item.title: post init
item.description: a very warm welcome to you all! after working years as a software developer in the industry, I figured out that I’m not happy with what I’m doing. I had started learning programming by digging the things which was looking a black-box to me, which had something waiting to be discovered. and then the wind of the life made my sail to go and I became a programmer, worked with several programming languages for companies which are doing some cool(!
